title: Minchat Chinukh

titles.text: Corrections From the Son of the Author

nodes.title: Corrections From the Son of the Author
nodes.key: Corrections From the Son of the Author

titles.text: הערה מאת הר' ישראל פרנס, מו"ץ בטרנופול

nodes.title: Comment from Rabbi Israel Parnes
nodes.heTitle: הערה מאת הר' ישראל פרנס, מו"ץ בטרנופול

enDesc: The Minchat Chinukh (“Offering of Education”, a play-on-words referencing a Temple sacrifice of the same name) is a legal commentary on the Sefer HaChinukh. It does not present practical conclusions but rather conceptual analysis, posing questions, problems, and uncommon test cases. Many subsequent commentaries were written on the Minchat Chinukh, and it is considered an important starting point for theoretical analysis of the commandments.
enShortDesc: 19th-century work that conceptually analyzes the legal parts of the Sefer HaChinukh.
heShortDesc: חיבור מן המאה ה-19 המציע ניתוח רעיוני לחלקים ההלכתיים בספר החינוך.
